mapper.select: select * from tbl_review where review_admin = 0 order by review_no

mapper.update: update tbl_review set review_title = #{review_title}, review_content = #{review_content}, review_area = #{review_area}, review_location =#{review_location}, review_campingname = #{review_campingname} where review_no = #{review_no}
